about_the_game:
Entity: Unknown is a multiplayer horror game with asymmetric gameplay. In it, four Hunters confront a dreadful Entity that they need to banish from the material world. A variety of different locations with their own characteristics, rich strategic gameplay for and unique atmosphere create an unforgettable experience of interacting with other players.


Play the way you want with a wide selection of Entities with unique abilities and a flexible skill system. Look for ways to counter the Hunters - force opponents to go where you want them to go, and drive them to frenzy with exciting talents.
Customize locations with their unique features, capture and modify territories as you wish, armed with a rich set of upgrades - let the space itself be your ally.
Get stronger, scare with unexpected and various traps, kill everyone who dared to disturb you. Show the Hunters that they are the victims here.


Survive at all costs and complete the ritual to banish evil from this world. Explore creepy abandoned locations using modern devices and your experience. Designate what kind of nightmare settled here this time.
Choose the character who suits you best. Combine your own skills with the skills of his partners and become stronger. Together with friends, immerse yourself in the atmosphere of mystery and horror lurking around the corner.
Avoid darkness, beware of traps, protect your sanity, look for the source of the Entity’s power and send it into oblivion by collecting the necessary ritual items. Nevertheless, hurry up, because the monster has already gone on the haunt and comes on the heels of.


Investigate the length and breadth of the places you visit. Explore the mysterious Hunters and Entities. Uncover the secrets of the enigmatic SSA organization.
What kind of people repeatedly banish terrible creatures from various legends and die time after time without reaching the goal? Where do the creatures of evil come from and why do they return? What kind of war actually unfolded in the most inconspicuous and abandoned corners of this world?
Look for the slightest clues in locations, listen to strange visions, try to connect everything together and reveal the essence of this ancient story, like time itself.


Choose any character among a variety of Entities from legends or Hunters with unique experience. Look for those strengths that are right for you.
Combine skills, upgrades with each other, collect unique sets of talents, cooperate with allies and see thousands of effective strategies and possibilities.
Use the features of many different locations that change from game to game. You never know what awaits at the end of a familiar corridor: a possible rescue or another trap.

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content that may not be appropriate for all ages or for viewing at work: Violence or gore. Mature content.

name: Entity: Unknown

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10/11
  • Processor: AMD FX-6100/Intel i3-3220 or Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 7750, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10/11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 1700/Intel i7-6700K or Equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX Vega 56, Nvidia GTX 1070/GTX1660Ti or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: Choose your side in the confrontation between the nightmare spawns and the SSA organization in an asymmetric multiplayer horror game. Spread the miasma of fear, become a real font of horror and plunge the Hunters into a madness, or plunge into an atmosphere of intense horror together with friends.
